attributes.action: Reduce Foreign Aid To  Protect and Serve UK Citizens
attributes.additional_details: That the obscene amounts of foreign aid that the UK pays to countries that either don't need it or are so corrupt that the aid never actually reaches the people that need it be massively reduced with immediate effect; and the savings made be used to reduce the proposed cuts to the budgets of the Police and Armed Forces so that the Government can more effectively fulfil its main responsibility of protecting and serving the citizens of the UK
